ref.Programmability.Name: CreateDistributiveDataTriggerMultiLink
ref.Programmability.CreateCommand:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[CreateDistributiveDataTriggerMultiLink] @entityId int, @name nvarchar(100)
AS BEGIN PRINT 'BEGIN' DECLARE @sql nvarchar(4000) DECLARE @trigerName nvarchar(400) SET @trigerName = @name+'_deleteDistributiveData' DECLARE @rightField nvarchar(200) DECLARE @leftField nvarchar(200) SET @leftField = (SELECT TOP 1 ef.Name FROM [ref].[EntityField] ef WHERE ef.[idEntity]=@entityId AND ef.idEntityFieldType = 7 ORDER BY ef.id) SET @rightField = (SELECT TOP 1 ef.Name FROM [ref].[EntityField] ef WHERE ef.[idEntity]=@entityId AND ef.idEntityFieldType = 7 ORDER BY ef.id DESC) if (@leftField IS NULL) RETURN; if (@rightField IS NULL) RETURN; PRINT 'Processing' PRINT 'leftField:' + @leftField
PRINT 'rightField:' + @rightField IF (EXISTS( SELECT * from sys.triggers WHERE name=@trigerName)) BEGIN SET @sql = 'DROP TRIGGER [ml].['+@trigerName+']' exec(@sql) END IF (NOT EXISTS( SELECT * from sys.triggers WHERE name=@trigerName)) BEGIN
SET @sql = ' CREATE TRIGGER [ml].['+@trigerName+'] ON [ml].['+@name +'] FOR DELETE AS DELETE FROM [ref].[DistributiveDataMultiLink] WHERE id IN (SELECT t.id FROM [ref].[DistributiveDataMultiLink] t INNER JOIN DELETED d on [d].['+@leftField+'] = t.[idLeft] AND [d].['+@rightField+'] = t.[idRight] WHERE [t].[idEntity] = '+CAST(@entityId as nvarchar(100))+')' PRINT @sql exec(@sql) END
SET @trigerName = @name+'_insertDistributiveData' IF (EXISTS( SELECT * from sys.triggers WHERE name=@trigerName)) BEGIN SET @sql = 'DROP TRIGGER [ml].['+@trigerName+']' exec(@sql) END
IF (NOT EXISTS( SELECT * from sys.triggers WHERE name=@trigerName)) BEGIN
PRINT 'AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA' SET @sql = ' CREATE TRIGGER [ml].['+@trigerName+'] ON [ml].['+@name +'] AFTER INSERT AS INSERT INTO [ref].[DistributiveDataMultiLink] ( [idEntity] ,[idLeft] ,[idRight]
) SELECT '+CAST(@entityId as nvarchar(100))+',['+@leftField+'],['+@rightField +'] FROM INSERTED ' PRINT @sql exec(@sql) SET @sql = '; DECLARE @enabled bit IF (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DistributiveDataInfo])) BEGIN SET @enabled = 0 END ELSE BEGIN SET @enabled = (SELECT TOP 1 enabled FROM [dbo].[DistributiveDataInfo]) END IF (@enabled =0) BEGIN DISABLE TRIGGER [ml].['+@trigerName+'] ON [ml].['+@name +'] END ' PRINT @sql exec(@sql) END END
